Official Webshop — The Mercer Brand is an Amsterdam-based high-end sneaker and apparel label founded by Dutch designer Pim Dresen. Known for its luxury handcrafted footwear and sustainable collections for men and women, the brand draws inspiration from vintage sports heritage.

2 weeks ago - Mercer is an American consulting firm founded in 1945. It is one of the four operating subsidiaries of global professional services firm Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC). Mercer is headquartered in New York City with offices in 43 countries and operations in 130 countries.
